post.desc: This is referencing [**an old news**](https://www.standard.co.uk/news/uk/swearing-parrots-uk-wildlife-park-customers-a4559041.html) where Lincolnshire Wildlife Park parrots got pulled from public display 'cause they were swearing at guests. For the record, the zoo thought it was hilarious, but they had to think about the children visiting too.
